name: Desert Robot Commandos
description:
FIGHT .. COLLECT .. RUN!About:

Your saucer has landed on an enemy planet. Raise a robot army, fight to collect the local resources, and then jump to the next level. Escape 10 levels to win.

You have three robot types at your disposal:

Turret Duck: This robot is the weakest until it moves into position. Then it deploys into a fearsome, long range opponent

Hunter Dog: The Hunter will seek out other bots to attack and is the fastest robot available

Siege Gorilla: The toughest bot. This one will seek out the closest resource pile and attack.

Features: Frantic Its turn based, but you can still take your turns as fast as you like. Try to keep control. Ten Thousand Levels Choose from one thousand campaigns, each ten levels long. Deep Strategy Three types of enemy robot to face, Three types of friendly robot to deploy. Development DesireBinary Gambit would love to develop this into a fully fledged game but needs funding. What do you think?Like it?

This prototype was developed for Ludum Dare 28 and we would really like to develop it into a fully featured turn-based strategy for Android and iOS.

Like all Binary Gambit Prototypes, if this game recieves enough interest it will be remade for Windows, Linux, Mac and Android using the Love2d framework.

Feedback on our prototypes is always welcome @BinaryGambit on Twitter
